data.title: bd-2ji: Replace DefaultHasher with stable FNV-1a hash
data.description: Replaces std DefaultHasher (unstable across Rust versions) with deterministic FNV-1a in prefix_hash. Prevents false projection rebuilds after rustc upgrades. Adds determinism and known-value tests.

data.reason: Security review: LGTM. FNV-1a implementation is correct (verified against published spec and test vectors). Hash is used solely for stale-detection in projection sync, not for any security boundary — an attacker with file write access could tamper with review data directly. No injection vectors: review IDs are validated (line 297-313), and hash input comes from validated file paths only. No cryptographic misuse. Clean removal of DefaultHasher imports.
